" While the CNN poll showed the President ' s disapproval rating is higher than that of Richard Nixon ' s in August 1974 , a statistical model generated by Frakemen , Lubel Pong shows that compared with Richard Nixon today , or I should say the remains of Richard Nixon , his adjusted disapproval rating would be 68 . So , I think there ' s enough egg on the collective faces at CNN to make an all you can eat omelet buffet at the Bellagio . I know because I ' ve been there twice "
